message: This proposal splits the money evenly considering the risk of inflation.
I'm willing to take a slightly larger risk of inflation, but still want a majority of the money.
I believe in fairness. This offer equally divides the money, considering both our needs and the risk of inflation.
I'm taking a risk with a very small share for you, but I think it's worth it to get most of the money now.
This proposal aims to balance risk and reward. It offers a compromise while considering the impact of inflation on our future earnings.
I'm taking a huge risk with a tiny share for you, but I'm trying to get as much as possible before inflation ruins everything.
This proposal tries to find a middle ground. It acknowledges the risk of inflation and aims to distribute the funds fairly.
